fields.description:
Description:
Missing custom background image, only label "Custom background image" is displayed.
The similar issue exists on Controls - Text Field - The Rest. Clicking "Background Image" button does not displays an image.

This is regression, does not occur on 2.0.2.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Run KitchenSink
2. Go to Controls - Text Field - Border Style

Expected result:
The label and custom background image should be displayed

Actual result:
Custom background image is missing
fields.summary: Android: TextField - Missing custom background image
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio, build: 2.1.0.201206062004
Titanium SDK: 2.1.0.v20120607000247
Device: Motorola Xoom 4.0.3
